quotes.quote: If you want people to do something, make it easy
quotes.author: Richard Thaler

quotes.quote: You will never reach your destination if you stop and throw stones at every dog that barks
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Comparison is the thief of joy
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: I can give you a six-word formula for success: Think things through, then follow through.
quotes.author: Captain Edward V. Rickenbacker

quotes.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, therefore, is not an act but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Do, or do not, there is no try
quotes.author: Yoda

quotes.quote: Whether you think you can or think you can't, you're right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: When it is dark enough, you can see the stars.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Wait for the right opportunity not the next available one
Sometimes you need to slow down to speed up
Great moments are born from great opportunities
